name: Chromatics
text:
Chromatics
Chromatics were an electronic music group.
In 2016, Chromatics played at the Roadhouse in Twin Peaks, Washington, performing "Shadow." Residents of town who turned out included Shelly, her friends Hannah and Renee, and James Hurley with his friend Freddie Sykes.
On another night, while Abbie, Natalie, and Trick were at the bar, Chromatics performed "Saturday."
Behind the scenes
Chromatics is an American electronic music band from Portland, Oregon, formed in 2001. The band consists of Ruth Radelet, Adam Miller, Nat Walker, and Johnny Jewel. Their performance for Twin Peaks was used as the end credits backdrop for Part 2 and Part 12.
